titles.title: Anime Tenchou Gekijouban
Аниме продавачът
アニメ店長 激情版

anime.description: A project made to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the http://anidb.net/cr803 [Animate] mascot character Anime Tenchou, screened at the Animate Ichioshi Bishoujo Matsuri event in Tokyo.
